text:
@realDonaldTrump @Shem_Infinite Thank you, Mr President. 
Now that the science "experts" announced we no longer need to worry about social distancing, please cancel the phased/staged reopening recommendations. Covid19 is no longer a danger to Americans, every state should open all businesses immediately!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
